entities.description: Whether the respondent ever loses interest in activities when feeling sad, empty, or depressed.
Whether the respondent ever loses interest in activities when feeling discouraged.
A period of time that lasted most of the day, almost every day, for two weeks or longer feeling depressed.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent ever loses interest in things when feeling sad, empty, or depressed.
Indicates whether the respondent ever loses interest in things when feeling discouraged.
Indicates whether the respondent had a period of depression that lasted most of the day, almost every day, for two weeks or longer.
